channel.title: Penetration Testing on Arvee's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Penetration Testing on Arvee's Blog

item.title: eJPT Certification Guide for Beginners (and Impatient Nerds Like Me)
item.description: During the last five months, I have been studying for the eJPT certification exam and i would like to share my experience with both the course and the certification process. I definitely had some conflicting thoughts about this experience and i would like for this post to be both a way for the reader to make a decision about purchasing the voucher and for me to spell my thoughts about my experience.
